architecture_overview: Dify's architecture is a microservices-based web application with frontend, backend API, database, and AI model services. It supports low-code AI app development with secure data handling and model inference.

components.name: Frontend
components.description: User interface for building and managing AI applications

components.name: Backend API
components.description: RESTful API gateway handling business logic and user requests

components.name: Database
components.description: Centralized storage for application metadata, user data, and model configurations

components.name: Model Service
components.description: AI model inference engine for executing machine learning predictions

data_flows.description: User input and UI interactions transmitted via HTTPS
Persistent storage of application metadata and user data
Request routing for AI model inference operations
Model configuration and result data storage
